The rooms were extremely comfortable,well lit and clean. We liked the decor and the open balcony with bifold doors. The view across to the beach was very nice.
Every morning, the Staff provided wonderful breakfast 

The staff were amazing and kind and very interested in their guests Stay experience. 
Overall, the staff were amazing. I couldnâ€™t recommend them more highly.

title: Above all expectations - we really hope to come back one day!
positive_txt:
YOU HAVE TO STAY HERE!
We travelled around Sri Lanka at the end of November for our Honeymoon and only had one night here on our itinerary, but I wish we had more! The property has been recently renovated to the highest standard. The quality of the building, facilities, and decor is amazing, extremely clean, and comfortable, but that is nothing compared to the staff. Nimesh and his team went above and beyond to ensure we had the best honeymoon stay, even for just one night. We were welcomed with a drink, and our room had been decorated. The rooms are spacious, modern, and we had an incredible sea view. Perfectly located on the sea front to explore Weligama with surf on your doorstep. Dinner and breakfast here were fantastic, lots of variety, full of flavour and a lovely restaurant setting. 
This place is exceptional value for money!
negative_txt: There isn't anything you can't not like!

title: Incredible food, drinks and location, as well as fantastic staff. I'll definitely be back!
positive_txt: The location is perfect. Directly across from the beach, and close to town and all the surf schools, cafes and restaurants. The staff are incredibly friendly, welcoming and helpful. They go out of their way to make sure you feel at home. The food is fantastic, plenty of options, both western and local, but the highlights for me were the cocktails (incredible taste and presentation, and cheap!), and the amazing pastries, which I found out are made on-site by the hotel's own pastry chef! The rooms are beautiful (I had a tour of a few of the top-floor luxury suites. The view of the beach and bay is brilliant!
negative_txt: Nothing. Just wish I could have stayed longer!

title: Exceptional! We'll definitely be back!
positive_txt: Amazing stay at Stay Ceylon, Weligama! The staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, and a special shout out to Podi for his exceptional cocktails â€“ truly the best! Huge thanks to Nimesh for all his help with organising our transport and surf sessions. The food was delicious, and the rooms were spotless with super comfortable beds. Couldnâ€™t have asked for more â€“ such an amazing way to end our trip around Sri Lanka. Weâ€™ll definitely be back!
